title: Lead
text: It’s a hot afternoon. The sun is blazing, and all you want is something cold and refreshing.

title: Obstacle
text: But most drinks are either too sugary or contain too many preservatives. Sometimes they are just not satisfying. So then all you’ve got are sticky fingers and no real rejuvenation.

title: Consequence
text: Without a real thirst-quencher, your energy comes down.

title: Zingy Lemonade
text: freshly squeezed lemonade with just the right balance of tart and sweet. Made on the spot, using real lemons, cool filtered water, and our special twist of mint. One sip, and the sunshine feels great again.
